Package org.blockchainnative.util

Class ReflectionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.blockchainnative.util.ReflectionUtil
  • public final class ReflectionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static utility methods for extracting information from smart contract interfaces via reflection.
    The class is not intended to be instantiated as it only provides static methods.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    SmartContract, ContractMethod, ContractEvent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.reflect.Type getActualReturnType​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      Returns a type representing the contract method's return type after unwrapping Future or CompletableFuture, and Result.
      static java.lang.Class<?> getEventType​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      Extracts the actual event type of a smart contract event method by unwrapping Observable and Event.
      static int getParameterIndex​(java.lang.reflect.Executable executable, java.lang.reflect.Parameter parameter)
      Returns the index of the given parameter as it occurs in the parameter list of the given executable.
      static boolean isAsyncReturnType​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      Checks whether the given contract method's return type is wrapped in Future or CompletableFuture.
      static boolean isVoidMethod​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      Checks if the return type of the given method is Void.TYPE or not.
      static boolean usesEventWrapper​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      Checks if the given event method is using the type Event to wrap the actual event object.
      static boolean usesResultWrapper​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
      Checks whether the given contract method's actual return type is wrapped in Result.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • isVoidMethod

        public static boolean isVoidMethod​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Checks if the return type of the given method is Void.TYPE or not.
        Parameters:
        method - a method
        Returns:
        true if the return type of the given method is Void.TYPE, false otherwise.

      • isAsyncReturnType

        public static boolean isAsyncReturnType​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Checks whether the given contract method's return type is wrapped in Future or CompletableFuture.
        Parameters:
        method - contract method
        Returns:
        true if the return type of the given method is wrapped in Future or CompletableFuture false otherwise.

      • getActualReturnType

        public static java.lang.reflect.Type getActualReturnType​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Returns a type representing the contract method's return type after unwrapping Future or CompletableFuture, and Result.

        This type is considered the actual return type of a method annotated with ContractMethod

        Parameters:
        method - contract method
        Returns:
        actual return type of the given contract method

      • usesResultWrapper

        public static boolean usesResultWrapper​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Checks whether the given contract method's actual return type is wrapped in Result.
        Parameters:
        method - contract method
        Returns:
        true if the return type of the given method is wrapped in Result, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        getActualReturnType(Method)

      • getEventType

        public static java.lang.Class<?> getEventType​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Extracts the actual event type of a smart contract event method by unwrapping Observable and Event.
        Parameters:
        method - contract event method
        Returns:
        Class representing the actual event type.

      • usesEventWrapper

        public static boolean usesEventWrapper​(java.lang.reflect.Method method)
        Checks if the given event method is using the type Event to wrap the actual event object.
        Parameters:
        method - Method to check. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        true if the given event method is using the type Event to wrap the actual event object, false otherwise.

      • getParameterIndex

        public static int getParameterIndex​(java.lang.reflect.Executable executable,
                                    java.lang.reflect.Parameter parameter)
        Returns the index of the given parameter as it occurs in the parameter list of the given executable.
        Parameters:
        executable - Method or Constructor containing the parameter. Must not be null.
        parameter - Parameter to find the index for. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        the parameter index or -1 if the parameter was not found on the given executable.
